3.label: LED Indication
3.description: LED status when device on or off.

options.label: LED ON when load is OFF
LED On when light is turned On

19.label: Alternate Exclusion
19.description: Enables alternate method for excluding the device to prevent accidental removal

options.label: Press two times ON button and two times OFF button, LED will flash 5 times if device is successfully excluded

metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press and release the top or bottom of the smart switch (rocker)
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press and release the top or bottom of the smart switch rocker)
metadata.reset: Quickly press ON (top) button three times, then, immediately press the OFF (bottom) button three times. The LED will flash ON/OFF five times when completed successfully
